channel.title: Rune (dash) Server
channel.description:
If you're from rune (dash) server.org you'd know what I'm talking about. Anyone know what's going on???
Zay331.

item.title: Rune (dash) Server
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:9, topic:371109”][quote author=Discardedx2 link=topic=467193.msg3416208#msg3416208 date=1291084590]
I was one of the people to help solve the case. Basically someone hacked a r-s administrator, and banned a lot of users. He then deleted the forums. I can assure all users there is no botnet on the forum, and the forum has been backed up. There was promoted staff, but that was done by the hacker. PowerBot will probably be next so i advice you not to go to their forum for a while, to make sure your runescape accounts are not at risk(if he does decide to add a botnet to the forum).

Also, just to clarify:

The hacker is NOT t-x
[/quote]This is why I like Moparscape more than every other community, we don’t have as many hackers, idiots, and overall fuckheads.[/quote]

It’s kind of funny how all the other community’s say there better then Mopar, yet most of them get hacked at least once a month…

Read full topic
